title: People Analytics Manager(SQL)
description:
**Job Description**
 Together with our amazing People Analytics teammates from DoorDash, we’re looking for an Analytics Manager to lead our small but mighty team of analysts responsible for self-service reporting and deep dives across the People space. The ideal candidate will excel as a “player - coach”, excited to provide functional leadership to the team, provide thought partnership to their stakeholders, and roll up their sleeves to dive into the data themselves.
   

  

 The role can be based in Finland (preferred), or Sweden. You can work onsite, hybrid, or fully remote from one of the mentioned locations - the work format is up to you 🙌
   

  

 You will work directly with stakeholders across the Wolt people team (as well as the rest of the Wolt business), serving as their thought partner to solve problems and prioritize solutions to big, thorny questions. You will report directly to the US-based Sr. Manager of People Analytics at DoorDash, and will partner closely with them and your US-based peers in Recruiting Analytics and Data Science to lead People Analytics across the globe.
   

  

**Your daily work will include**
* Supervising the day-to-day work of your team of analysts responsible for people analytics, recruiting analytics, and similar.
* Serving as the trusted advisor, thought leader, and representative of the global People Analytics team to your stakeholders across Wolt.
* Leading the development of metrics, reports, dashboards and analyses, putting high-quality insights directly into the hands of your stakeholders.
* Developing a cohesive vision and roadmap together with your peers and partner teams across the globe, including US-based Data Science, People Analytics, Recruiting Analytics, Data Engineering, and People Applications teams.
* Dive into the data, diagnosing data and reporting needs, building new solutions, and providing answers to big, ambiguous, critical problems.


**Our humble expectations**
* Education: Degree in a quantitatively focused discipline, e.g., experimental psychology, economics, computer science, physics, or similar.
* Strong experience working as an Analyst, BI Developer, Analytics Engineer, Data Scientist, or techy Data Analyst. People/HR Analytics experience is strongly preferred.
* Experience leading small teams with outsized impact.
* Demonstrated experience working with and influencing technical and nontechnical cross-functional peers and stakeholders. This will be a highly visible role within the People Team, and building trust with your colleagues will be critical.
* Tech skills: Python, SQL, R, AWS, and one of the modern BI tools (Tableau, Power BI, Looker, Sigma, or similar). Advanced SQL skills, and ability to write optimized queries for large data sets.
* Subject Matter Expertise: Deep expertise in data visualization and analysis. Some expertise in statistics is preferred (regressions, t-tests). Nice to have: Experience analyzing survey data.
* Since you’ll be taking care of our internal stakeholders, we’re looking for someone who truly enjoys interacting with people on a daily basis. The ability to search for information and ask relevant questions from various teams will be crucial.


**Next Steps**
**Why you'll love working with us
   

  

 The position will be filled as soon as we find the right person, so make sure to apply as soon as you realize you really, really want to join us!**
* Complex environment with tons of data just waiting to be utilized — you’ll get hands-on experience in working on various TA metrics and topics.
* You can choose the ways of working - work onsite, hybrid, or fully remote from one of the locations mentioned above.
* You would get to work in a company culture where we take ownership beyond the obvious, do common things uncommonly well, think big but stay humble, do right by people, treat others kindly and justly, and recognize that if we don’t learn, we won’t stay still but fall behind and keep in mind that Luke was Yoda’s greatest achievement. Read more about how we work.


 If you are excited about working in a high-growth environment, taking ownership, and being part of an extremely ambitious team, then click below to apply and get the conversation going!
   

  

 If you have any further questions about the position, you can turn to:
   

  

 Orsi Kocsis, Senior Talent Acquisition Partner - orsolya.kocsis@wolt.com
   

  

 Please note that
 **we do not accept applications sent by mail** 
 . You should submit your application through our careers website!
   

  

**About Wolt**
*Wolt is a Helsinki-based technology company that provides an online platform for consumers, merchants, and couriers. It connects people looking to order food and other goods with people interested in selling and delivering them. To enable this, Wolt develops a wide range of technologies from local logistics to retail software and financial solutions – as well as operating its own grocery stores under the Wolt Market brand. Wolt’s products include Wolt+ (subscription service for customers), Wolt for Work (meal benefits and office deliveries for companies), Wolt Drive (fast last-mile deliveries for merchants), and Wolt Self-Delivery (service for merchant partners with their own delivery staff). Wolt’s mission is to make cities better by empowering and growing local communities. Wolt was founded in 2014 and joined forces with DoorDash in 2022. DoorDash operates in 31 countries today, 27 of which are with the Wolt product and brand.*
***So, why work at Wolt?***
**At Wolt, We’re About Getting Things Done.**
 You’ll probably enjoy it here if you like taking ownership, developing yourself, and being around friendly, humble, and ambitious people.
   

  

*We work hard to make cities into better places, and it’s pretty cool seeing us grow every week. If you’re passionate about building things that just… work, Wolt might be for you.*
***Our Commitment to Diversity, Equity & Inclusion**
 We want to have all sorts of people in our team – people like you and me, and people different from you and me. To be able to work with diverse teammates – when it comes to gender, age, ethnicity, life background, sexual orientation, political views, religion, or any other personal trait – we consciously aim to offer equal opportunity for everyone to work with us. This is because we believe diverse teams make the most thought-through decisions and build things in the most inclusive way.*
*Join us today to build Wolt together.*

title: Golang Engineer
description:
This is our general process for Golang engineers of all levels of seniority, for all relevant teams at Canonical. Apply here if you are an exceptional software engineer who prefers to work in Go. After the first round of interviews we'll find the best fit product team at Canonical for you to progress your application based on your personal interests.
   

  

 Canonical prefers Golang for software where performance and security are primary considerations. We also have substantial projects in Python, C, C++ and are starting to invest in Rust. For front-end development we prefer React and Flutter.
   

  

 Golang is an essential language for our engineering teams, who build the systems that deliver Ubuntu to the world. From our software distribution systems, to those which build and test every possible kind of open source on every architecture, from our systems management tools to our distributed systems operations R&D, we count on Golang for its tasteful concurrency and developer ecosystem. Juju, Livepatch, LXD, MAAS, Microk8s, Snapd, Ubuntu Core, Ubuntu Pro, and many more Canonical offerings include Golang components.
   

  

 We also want to ensure that Ubuntu is the very best platform for Golang development, offering easy access to the widest range of tooling and capabilities that support cutting edge open source and enterprise development.
   

  

 Join us in our mission to deliver innovative open-source solutions to individuals and enterprises around the world. We expect the highest engineering standards and strong motivation to get things done well in a fully remote and distributed environment. These roles require extensive personal experience with Linux - the more different versions of Linux the better!
   

  

**Location** 
 : we have open roles for Golang engineers in every time zone
   

  

**The role entails**
* Design and implement well-tested and documented software in Go
* Debug and fix issues encountered by your users
* Participate in our engineering process through code and architectural reviews
* Collaborate with community and colleagues on technical specifications
* Seek improvements to engineering and operations practices
* In some cases, deploy and operate services developed by the team
* Contribute to the success of your product through technical advocacy


**What we are looking for in you**
* An exceptional academic track record from both high school and university
* Undergraduate degree in Computer Science or STEM, or a compelling narrative about your alternative path
* Drive and a track record of going above-and-beyond expectations
* Well-organized, self-starting and able to deliver to schedule
* Professional manner interacting with colleagues, partners, and community
* Experience designing and writing high-quality Golang software on Linux
* Experience with and passion for Linux at the system level
* For more senior roles, experience building, deploying, and operating distributed systems and APIs
* Professional written and spoken English
* Experience with Linux (Debian or Ubuntu preferred)
* Excellent interpersonal skills, curiosity, flexibility, and accountability
* Passion, thoughtfulness, and self-motivation
* Excellent communication and presentation skills
* Result-oriented, with a personal drive to meet commitments
* Ability to travel twice a year, for company events up to two weeks each


**Nice-to-have skills**
* Experience developing for Ubuntu Linux
* Experience with Juju, LXD, Microk8s, Snapd, Ubuntu Core, Ubuntu Pro
* Performance engineering and security experience


**What we offer colleagues**
 We consider geographical location, experience, and performance in shaping compensation worldwide. We revisit compensation annually (and more often for graduates and associates) to ensure we recognize outstanding performance. In addition to base pay, we offer a performance-driven annual bonus or commission. We provide all team members with additional benefits, which reflect our values and ideals. We balance our programs to meet local needs and ensure fairness globally.
   

  

* Distributed work environment with twice-yearly team sprints in person
* Personal learning and development budget of USD 2,000 per year
* Annual compensation review
* Recognition rewards
* Annual holiday leave
* Maternity and paternity leave
* Employee Assistance Program
* Opportunity to travel to new locations to meet colleagues
* Priority Pass, and travel upgrades for long haul company events


**About Canonical**
 Canonical is a pioneering tech firm at the forefront of the global move to open source. As the company that publishes Ubuntu, one of the most important open source projects and the platform for AI, IoT and the cloud, we are changing the world of software. We recruit on a global basis and set a very high standard for people joining the company. We expect excellence - in order to succeed, we need to be the best at what we do. Most colleagues at Canonical have worked from home since its inception in 2004. Working here is a step into the future, and will challenge you to think differently, work smarter, learn new skills, and raise your game.
   

  

**Canonical is an equal opportunity employer**
 We are proud to foster a workplace free from discrimination. Diversity of experience, perspectives, and background create a better work environment and better products. Whatever your identity, we will give your application fair consideration.

title: Senior iOS Developer (UniFi Design Center)
description:
At Ubiquiti Inc., we create technology platforms for Businesses, Smart Homes, and Internet Service Providers, driven by our goal to connect everyone, everywhere by Rethinking IT. To date, Ubiquiti has shipped over 100 million devices worldwide, from ISP networking products to next generation of IT solutions. At Ubiquiti, you’ll heighten your potential and broaden your horizons, while shaping the future of connectivity.
   

  

**We are currently looking for a highly skilled Senior iOS Developer to our team in Stockholm, Sweden.**
***Please be aware that a valid work permit is a mandatory requirement to be considered for the role.***
**Product And Team**
 UniFi Design Center. The app is a n intelligent companion app that gives you guidance about suggested product offerings across all Ubiquiti product segments, seamlessly integrates with our Ul Store, Community, and offers detailed Tech Specs at your fingertips. Powered by state-of-the-art Al technology, UniFi Design Center is more than just an app; it's your personal guide in the expansive world of Ul products and services.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Create state of the art mobile apps that are both powerful and easy to use with elite UX applied
* Work in an agile environment, individually and with a team of developers across multiple R&D sites globally


**Requirements:**
* Proven track record of releasing and maintaining successful iOS apps
* Ability to write efficient code, with knowledge of performance implications, such as CPU and memory usage
* Extensive knowledge of Swift, SwiftUI and Core Data
* Extensive knowledge app life cycle and networking
* Experience working with WKWebView
* Experience with SwiftLint, SwiftFormat or similar tools
* Experience with RESTful APIs
* Proficient understanding of Git versioning tool
* Passion for design and great UX, understanding Apple´s human interface guidelines
* You take ownership of your tasks, you can work independently and you strive to write clean code
* Excellent communication skills and highly proficient in English (written and spoken)


**Nice to have:**
* Experience with WebRTC, BLE and Core Audio


**Benefits**
* International work environment
* Competitive compensation package
* Wellness allowance, occupational pension, medical insurance, life insurance, work-injury insurance
* Five weeks of holiday per year
* Flexible work hours
* Modern office space located in Epicenter(Hötorget)
* Access to all the latest Ubiquiti products and prototypes for home use and tests

title: Head of Impact & Startup Founder (March 2025)
job_function: Information Technology, Business Development, and Strategy/Planning
company_industry: Venture Capital and Private Equity Principals
description:
**This ad is not for an employment, but an opportunity to build a VC-backed startup from the ground up.** 




  





**Who you are:** 




 You are a highly accomplished professional with a demonstrated track record in advancing sustainability initiatives. Your expertise lies within critical areas like renewable energy, food security, or the blue economy. Driven by a passion for positive change, you envision building a groundbreaking tech startup that disrupts the status quo and propels sustainability solutions forward.
 



  





**About Antler** 




 Antler is the world's most active venture capital firm, providing funding from pre-seed to Series C. We invest in Founders who seek to define our tomorrow and reshape the world we live in with groundbreaking technological innovation. Every year, we handpick the strongest Founders from more than 135,000 applicants across our 27 locations on the globe, which has led us to work with more than 7,000 founders to date and a portfolio of more than 1,000 startups.
 



  





**The Antler Founder Residency** 




 Join a dynamic cohort of 200+ highly motivated entrepreneurs for an immersive 12-week program. Visit our website for a detailed breakdown of how we'll support your startup launch.
 


* 12-Week full-time Immersive Journey: Kicking off March, 2025, in Stockholm.
* Co-Founder Discovery: In the first 10 weeks, collaborate with fellow Founders to find your co-founder(s).
* Pitch to Invest: Present your team and business idea to the Antler Investment Committee. Secure a net cash investment of EUR 100k for 10% equity.
* Accelerate Growth: If funded, we work closely with you to make your startup a success!



  





**Program Details** 



* **Start Date:** 
 March 3rd, 2025
* **Location:** 
 Onsite at our Stockholm office
* **Compensation:** 
 While participants don't receive financial compensation during the program, pre-seed investment is available to jumpstart your venture.
* **Visa Sponsorship:** 
 Due to the non-employment nature of the program, visa sponsorship is unavailable.



  





**Ideal Candidate Profile** 



* **Domain Expertise:** 
 Possess in-depth knowledge of sustainability sectors like renewable energy, waste management, or the blue economy. You're passionate about building scalable solutions for a greener future.
* **Problem-solving Prowess:** 
 Derive satisfaction from developing innovative products that address real-world challenges.
* **Impact Driven:** 
 Fuel a burning desire to make a positive difference for both people and the planet.
* **Optional:** 
 Arrive equipped with a nascent business idea focused on a specific problem, solution, or technology.



  





**Application Process** 




 Our streamlined application process takes only 2-3 weeks:
 


1. Apply through our website.
2. Participate in an introductory interview.
3. Progress to an in-depth interview with our partners.
4. Receive a potential offer.



  





**Meet Our Nordic Success Stories:** 



* **Wingbits:** 
 Community-driven flight data; redefining air travel efficiency.
* **Two:** 
 A comprehensive B2B payment suite simplifying sales for online and offline businesses.
* **Evyon:** 
 A developer of eco-friendly battery energy storage systems.
* **Glint Solar:** 
 Software accelerating identification of optimal solar installation sites.
* **PerPlant:** 
 AI-powered sensor systems creating a gateway to sustainable agriculture

title: Solutions Architect
description:
**Lösningsarkitekter till B3 Visab Consulting**
 Hos B3 Visab Consulting stödjer vi finansindustrins utveckling i den digitala ekonomin. Vi söker nu fler engagerade lösningsarkitekter som vill vara med och bidra till en samhällskritisk bransch. Med över 40 års erfarenhet har vi byggt långsiktiga relationer med ledande aktörer inom bank och försäkring, och vår expertis gör oss även till en attraktiv partner för snabbfotade uppstickare.
   

  

**Om rollen:** 
 Som lösningsarkitekt hos oss får du möjligheten att arbeta som konsult i varierande uppdrag där du hjälper kunder att utveckla och implementera robust lösningsarkitektur. Du kommer till exempel att:
   

  

* Bryta ned krav och behov och omvandla dessa till förstklassiga lösningar.
* Designa och dokumentera olika arkitekturlösningar.
* Vägleda utvecklingsteamet och säkerställa att lösningen överensstämmer med den övergripande arkitekturen.
* Agera bollplank, ge råd och stöd till både verksamhet och utvecklare.


**Vidare ser vi att du har följande kvalifikationer:**
* Minst 4 års erfarenhet från lösningsarkitektrollen.
* Minst 2 års erfarenhet från bank- eller försäkringsområdet.
* Kompetens och erfarenhet av integrationslösningar mellan applikationer/system.
* Färdigheter inom dokumentation.
* Erfarenhet från konsultrollen.
* Certifieringar och erfarenheter inom relevanta områden.
* Arbetar obehindrat på svenska och engelska i både tal och skrift.


 Vi tror att framgång bygger på samarbete och kunskapsdelning och vi ser gärna att du är en lagspelare som uppskattar att arbeta prestigelöst och flexibelt.
   

  

**Vi erbjuder:**
* Attraktiv och flexibel lönemodell.
* Möjlighet att påverka dina arbetstider och arbetsplats.
* Tillgång till utbildningar och certifieringar för din professionella utveckling.
* En stark wellness-satsning genom Team B3, som främjar både hälsa och arbetsglädje.


**Varför B3 Visab Consulting?** 
 Vi är en del av B3 Consulting Group, ett av Sveriges snabbast växande företag inom IT och management. Hos oss får du det bästa av två världar: kraften från ett stort bolag och den personliga samhörigheten från ett mindre. Vi är stolta över att ha blivit erkända som "Årets Karriärföretag" och av "Great Place to Work". Våra medarbetare pratar om friheten att påverka sina uppdrag, arbetsmiljön där olikheter välkomnas, och stoltheten över att bidra till både kunders framgång och samhället i stort. Vi samarbetar med initiativ som Women in Tech, Changers Hub och Pink Programming för att göra skillnad.
   

  

**Kontakt** 
 Är du redo att ta nästa steg i din karriär? Ansök nu! Har du frågor är du välkommen att kontakta Lidia Hagos (lidia.hagos@b3.se) eller konsultchef Hanna Skoog (+4670-260 12 65).

title: Senior Fullstack .NET-utvecklare
description:
**Företagsbeskrivning**
 AFRY erbjuder tjänster inom teknik, design, digitalisering och rådgivning. Vi är hängivna experter inom industri, energi- och infrastruktur, som skapar värde för kommande generationer. AFRY har en global räckvidd med djupa rötter i Norden. Tillsammans accelererar vi omställningen till ett mer hållbart samhälle.
   

  

**Jobbeskrivning**
 I rollen som .NET-utvecklare arbetar du med att designa, utveckla och underhålla applikationer för våra kunder. Beroende på uppdrag kommer du att arbeta självständigt eller tillsammans med kollegor hos oss. Du kommer att tillhöra ett team av utvecklare, arkitekter och andra experter.
   

  

 AFRY söker en .NET-utvecklare som vill vara med och göra skillnad.
   

  

 Vi hjälper våra kunder, som finns inom olika branscher - både nationellt och internationellt, att utvecklas och driva sin verksamhet framåt. Vi erbjuder dig ett stimulerande och utvecklande arbete i spännande projekt som gör skillnad för våra kunder och samhället.
   

  

**Vad innebär tjänsten som .NET-utvecklare hos oss?**
* Designa och utveckla innovativa och skalbara applikationer med .NET-teknologier.
* Samarbeta nära med intressenter för att förstå krav och affärsmål.
* Implementera och underhålla API:er och integrationer.
* Arbeta med frontend-utveckling med React samt HTML, CSS och JavaScript.
* Optimera applikationens prestanda och skalbarhet.
* Delta i kodgranskningar och bidra till bästa praxis.
* Utforska och implementera nya teknologier och lösningar.
* Stödja kunder i digitaliseringsprojekt och förbättringar.


 Utöver härliga och kompetenta kollegor får du även en dedikerad chef som stöttar din karriärutveckling och arbetar direkt med dig i projekten.
   

  

**Kvalifikationer**
 Våra värdeord Brave, Devoted, Teamplayers beskriver väl hur vi ser på oss själva.
   

  

 Nu letar vi efter dig som är en teamorienterad och engagerad person med en gedigen bakgrund inom systemutveckling.
   

  

* Kandidatexamen i datavetenskap eller relaterat område.
* Flera års erfarenhet av .NET-utveckling (C#, ASP.NET, .NET Core).
* Erfarenhet av frontend-utveckling, särskilt med React.
* Kunskap om databaser som SQL Server eller MySQL, Postgresql. eller liknad
* Erfarenhet av versionshanteringssystem (t.ex. Git).
* Erfarenhet av molnteknologier (Azure eller AWS) är meriterande.
* Förmåga att översätta affärsbehov till tekniska specifikationer.
* Utmärkta kommunikativa och samarbetsförmågor.
* Måste kunna tala flytande svenska och engelska.


 Vi lägger stor vikt vid personliga egenskaper och din vilja att skapa värde för kunder och kollegor.
   

  

 Urval görs löpande! Varmt välkommen med din ansökan!
   

  

**Ytterligare information**
 Vår enhet Digital Services verkar över hela utvecklingskedjan med experter inom projektledning, kravanalys, QA och test, systemutveckling, arkitektur, dataanalys och AI, cybersäkerhet m.m.
   

  

 Vad erbjuder AFRY dig som anställd?
   

  

 Vi har regelbundna träffar där temat varierar mellan kompetens och socialt utbyte, eller både och. En bra balans helt enkelt!
   

  

 Du får du t.ex.:
   

  

* En AFRY Buddy som bollplank under din första tid som anställd
* Balans i arbetslivet med möjlighet till hybridarbete.
* Tillgång till Club AFRY där en bredd av spännande och underhållande aktiviteter för våra medarbetare anordnas - det finns något för alla! Läs gärna mer här.
* Konkurrenskraftiga förmåner gällande pension, friskvård och föräldraledighet reglerade i vårt kollektivavtal
* Företagsrabatter med externa partners genom vår förmånsportal Advantage You.
* Friskvårdsbidrag 4500 SEK/år.
* Restauranger och kaféer på plats
* Ett enormt nätverk av tekniska experter med +19 000 kollegor runtom i världen.


**Välkommen med din ansökan, sista ansökningsdag är 2025-01-16**
**Kontaktperson för frågor:**
 Aamir Faried, Gruppchef
   

  

 aamir.faried@afry.com
   

  

 Vi undanber oss direktkontakt med bemannings- och rekryteringsföretag samt säljare av ytterligare jobbannonser.
   

  

*På AFRY driver vi förändring i allt vi gör. Vi anser att förändring sker när modiga idéer möts, när vi samarbetar, skapar innovation och omfamnar kreativa lösningar, det är så vi skapar framtiden. Vi söker konstant kvalificerade kandidater som vill ansluta sig till våra inkluderande team runt om i världen. Bli en del av oss och påskynda den gröna omställningen*

title: Senior Backend Developer
description:
Kundo är ett SaaS-bolag som erbjuder Nordens mest okrångliga kundservicelösning. Kundservice är en bransch i snabb förändring där ny teknik/AI har medfört stora möjligheter till innovation och effektivisering. Det innebär att vi har en spännande resa framför oss där vår produkt både ska byggas ut men också transformeras för att möta nya behov och de möjligheter som finns med AI.
 



 På vår fortsatta tillväxtresa letar vi efter dig som vill ansluta till vårt fantastiska produktutvecklingsteam som backend-utvecklare med kunskap och intresse för infrastruktur och drift.
 



 Denna roll kommer att bidra till att framtidssäkra vår plattform och möjliggöra våra AI-drivna initiativ, delta i utvecklingsprojekt, samt vidareutveckla och underhålla vår skalbar cloud-arkitektur och hantering av säkerhetslösningar. För att trivas i rollen tror vi att du har:
 



  




* Minst 5 år erfarenhet av webbutveckling
* Bred erfarenhet av produktutveckling i Python
* Djup kunskap av AWS infrastruktur och Infrastructure as code
* Känner dig trygg gällande DevOps praxis och har praktisk erfarenhet av mjukvaru-releaser (helst continous deployment)



  





**Om vår produkt** 




 Med vår produkt får våra kunder ett modernt och kraftfullt kundserviceverktyg att samarbeta i för att svara på alla ärenden som de får in. Med hjälp av vår produkt levererar organisationer i Norden en bättre kundserviceupplevelse till tiotusentals kunder varje dag.
 



 Flera miljoner meddelanden passerar genom våra system varje månad - och den siffran ökar hela tiden. Enkelheten i att använda våra tjänster är mycket uppskattat av våra kunder och något vi är stolta över.
 



 Undrar du vilka tekniker vi arbetar med? Här är de tekniker du kommer att arbeta med:
 



  




* Python - Django/FastAPI
* AWS (Kostnadsoptimering, Nätverk, IAM)
* Kubernetes
* Terraform
* MySQL
* Elastic Search



  





**Vad kan vi erbjuda dig?** 



* Små team med täta samarbeten inom och utanför teamet
* Högt lärande och delaktighet i alla delar av produktutvecklingen
* Goda förmåner som ett 32 dagars semester, kollektivavtal, friskvårdsbidrag på 5000 kr/år, pension (ITP-1) och privatvårdsförsäkring
* Hybrid-upplägg som möjliggör remotearbete 2 dagar/vecka
* Konferensresa varje höst, roliga teamaktiviteter och interna events, sommarfest och julbord, etc



  





 Har du några frågor? Vi berättar gärna mer! Hör av dig till Jonatan Larsson på 070-5124424 eller jonatan@kundo.se. Till denna tjänst tar vi ingen hjälp av partners, utan kommer att sköta processerna på egen hand internt.

title: Developer Relations Engineer
description:
Canonical is a leading provider of open-source software and operating systems for global enterprise and technology markets. Our platform, Ubuntu, is very widely used in breakthrough enterprise initiatives such as public cloud, data science, AI, engineering innovation and IoT. Our customers include the world's leading public cloud and silicon providers, and industry leaders in many sectors. The company is a pioneer of global distributed collaboration, with 1100+ colleagues in 75+ countries and very few office-based roles. Teams meet two to four times yearly in person, in interesting locations around the world, to align on strategy and execution.
   

  

 The company is founder led, profitable and growing.
   

  

 We are hiring a
 **Developer Relations Engineer** 
 to join a new Developer Relations team that we have created to engage directly with open source communities and developer-centric organizations. We hope both to communicate our vision and products for better open source development experiences, and also to have a better feedback loop from those audiences to shape our offerings and priorities.
   

  

 A Developer Relations Engineer is a technical expert, strategist and communicator with deep empathy for developers. This discipline combines practical engineering skills with firm diplomacy across organizational boundaries, in both directions. Like our audience, a Developer Relations Engineer is never satisfied with the status quo, and is driven by an insatiable curiosity to find better ways to get things done. They are problem-solvers and inventors, who understand people's needs and love the way that tools can be adapted to meet them. They stay current with tech trends and provide insights and guidance while fostering innovation.
   

  

**Location** 
 : This role will be based remotely in the APAC and EMEA regions.
   

  

**The role entails**
* Contribute to product management team meetings
* Maintain conversations with developer community members
* Engage on IRC, social media, product forums, meet-ups and more
* Collaborate across Canonical teams
* Solve specific technical problems that users or colleagues have identified
* Contribute to technical documentation
* Work on technical articles, presentations or workshops
* Identify new opportunities in developer experience
* Present at conferences, meetups or technical events


**What we are looking for in you**
* An exceptional academic track record from both high school and university
* Undergraduate degree in Computer Science or STEM, or a compelling narrative about your alternative path
* Drive and a track record of going above-and-beyond expectations
* Developer with a demonstrable engagement in open-source software
* Well-organized, self-starting and able to deliver to schedule
* Professional manner interacting with colleagues, partners, and community
* Experience of Linux software packaging (deb, rpm or snap)
* Contributor to open-source communities, software and documentation
* An engaging, vivacious speaker and presenter
* Effective, tactful, empathetic and confident
* Builds trust, relationships and confidence
* Result-oriented, with a personal drive to meet commitments
* Ability to travel twice a year, for company events up to two weeks each
* Ability to travel in addition to upstream and industry events


**Nice-to-have skills**
* Experience in a developer advocacy or community role
* Ops and system administration experience
* Performance engineering and security experience


**What we offer colleagues**
 We consider geographical location, experience, and performance in shaping compensation worldwide. We revisit compensation annually (and more often for graduates and associates) to ensure we recognize outstanding performance. In addition to base pay, we offer a performance-driven annual bonus or commission. We provide all team members with additional benefits, which reflect our values and ideals. We balance our programs to meet local needs and ensure fairness globally.
   

  

* Distributed work environment with twice-yearly team sprints in person
* Personal learning and development budget of USD 2,000 per year
* Annual compensation review
* Recognition rewards
* Annual holiday leave
* Maternity and paternity leave
* Employee Assistance Program
* Opportunity to travel to new locations to meet colleagues
* Priority Pass, and travel upgrades for long haul company events


**About Canonical**
 Canonical is a pioneering tech firm at the forefront of the global move to open source. As the company that publishes Ubuntu, one of the most important open source projects and the platform for AI, IoT and the cloud, we are changing the world of software. We recruit on a global basis and set a very high standard for people joining the company. We expect excellence - in order to succeed, we need to be the best at what we do. Most colleagues at Canonical have worked from home since its inception in 2004. Working here is a step into the future, and will challenge you to think differently, work smarter, learn new skills, and raise your game.
   

  

**Canonical is an equal opportunity employer**
 We are proud to foster a workplace free from discrimination. Diversity of experience, perspectives, and background create a better work environment and better products. Whatever your identity, we will give your application fair consideration.

title: Head of Research & Innovation Norbal
company_industry: Food and Beverage Manufacturing and Dairy Product Manufacturing
description:
**Danone** 
 ’s mission is to bring health through food to as many people as possible while ensuring a healthy planet. With over 100,000 employees worldwide, we are committed to our vision of One Planet One Health. Our Nordics & Baltics team includes 500 employees and trusted brands like Alpro, Activia, YoPro, and more.
 



  





**About the Ro** 
 le
 *- The Head of R&I Norbal is responsible for the development of superior products, eco-designed packaging and communications in line with consumer needs, business opportunities and brand strateg* 
 y.
 



  





**Responsibilities -** 




  




* Lead the local R&I team on the scope of the brands and categories of the Business Unit (Dairy, Plant Based, Waters, 1st Diet) being integral part of the R&I EU community. Locally be a key partner within the Business unit community as extended leadership team member.
* Work with R&I brand owners in assigned EU Brand leadership. Contribute to the seeding of the Inno / Reno/ Reformulation of the local categories, co-build the Productivity portfolio through reformulation with the Topline & Operations teams.
* Be responsible for the R&I portfolio Inno / Reno / Reformulation and secure and manage its execution in connection with R&I Category Europe, via managing local stakeholders, engagement through samples, excellence in brief executing.
* Be responsible for local IDEATE (Explore & Select) and DEFINE phase of projects, making sure the right local consumer insights based on consumer needs, and the right local competitive, regulatory and health insights are part of the definition of the product brief that is then managed by R&I EU Category team.
* Be responsible for the excellence in brief execution, making sure the full mix (product/pack/communication) developed by the R&I EU Category team and the project team, are consistent between the initial brief and the execution.
* Contribute to the capitalization of claims based on User Experience UX and Health & Nutrition H&N product data in connection with the EU teams.
* Master the local competitive set, via the realization of frequent diagnoses/ mappings/competitors overview, to be leveraged at EU level to drive recommendations for future innovations and renovations. Leverage local competitive insights at EU level, working within the EU community to maximize learning scale.
* Co-lead with UX team the superiority program, making sure Innos/Renos are executed with the right action standards and KPIs.
* Represent R&I in local decision forums making sure EU R&I programs are prioritized and executed within the local scope.
* Be responsible for full Innovation process phases, from IDEATE to LAUNCH, for local brands (Proviva and Aqua d’Or).



  





**Required Skills and Experience:** 




  




* Solid food technology, science and nutrition foundation (engineer), bac + 5 minimum.
* Solid experience in formulation & process (Dairy, Plant-Based, Waters) and knowledge of packaging.
* Experienced in understanding the FMCG consumer and market and local business and products.
* Passion for R&I and desire to contribute to building products that deliver superior, sustainable and profitable consumer experiences.
* Taking initiative, autonomy and ability to analyze and report on results accompanied by recommendations in a short period of time.
* Being comfortable with change or crisis management, solution-oriented personality.
* Team spirit and willingness to develop employees.
* Comfortable in communicating, both in writing and verbally.
* Capability to explore consumer insights through consumer deep dive and interaction.
* Good understanding of the claims, and demo creation process.
* Fluent in English (spoken & written).
* Computer skills such as office software package including Excel and Power Point.
* Comfortable with Power BI utilization helping Danone R&I teams to efficiently analyze data, create insightful reports, and collaborate effectively.



  





 Location of role: Stockholm, Sweden or Helsinki, Finland, or Copenhagen, Denmark, or Riga, Latvia.
 



  





 Click “APPLY” and send in your application in English
 **before February 6th, 2025.** 
 We review applications and conduct interviews continuously, so don’t wait to
 **apply! Kindly note that the position may be filled before last application date.** 




  





 We are proud to be an equal opportunity employer. We believe that our differences make us stronger and that an inclusive working environment drives our growth. All applicants will be considered for employment without attention to race, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age, or disability status.
 



  





 Join us in our mission to create a more sustainable world. One Planet One Health BY YOU.

title: Postproducent
description:

 Vi på Storstad är glada över att kunna berätta att vi växer. Därför söker vi nu efter en medarbetare som vill bidra till att skapa förstklassigt innehåll som får tittaren att få en riktig wow-känsla. Nu söker vi efter en engagerad och kunnig medarbetare som tycker om att samarbeta med andra och som har ett bra öga för det visuella.
 



  





**Vi tror att du är** 



* Ansvarstagande
* Teknikintresserad
* Bra på att planera din tid
* Leveranssäker
* Kreativ
* Har lätt för att skapa visuellt innehål
* Bra på att kommunicera med andra i din omgivning
* Strukturerad



  





  





**Du kommer att arbeta med att skapa** 



* Film
* Poddar

**Du kommer att få arbeta med**

* Grafisk formgivning
* Trycksaker

**Du får gärna vara bekväm att arbeta i följande program**

* Pro Tools

* Gillar att arbeta på kunders uppdrag

* Har lätt för att jobba med flera parallella projekt
* Har ett flexibelt förhållningssätt till oförutsedda händelser
* Har lätt för att justera planer i fall saker och ting ändras

 Om du är intresserad av tjänsten, vänligen mejla ditt CV till max@storstad.io senast den 20 januari 2025.

title: Product Designer
description:
**Description**
*Position at LeoVegas Group*
**About The Role**
 We are looking for a UX Designer to join our Design team. The primary focus of this role is to ensure that our users enjoy a seamless, intuitive, and enjoyable gaming experience on our platform.
   

  

 You will work closely with your manager and other UX designers to support the rest of the organization and enhance our user interface designs.
   

  

 If you are passionate about creating user-centered designs, making data driven decisions, implementing innovative features, and leading improvements for intuitive, and user-friendly solutions, then this is the role for you!
   

  

 YOU WILL BE RESPONSIBLE FOR:
   

  

* Be responsible for driving the discovery design process of our platform
* Ensure we focus on the right things to build a better user experience
* Focus on the native app for LeoVegas in multiple markets
* Improve and maintain the applications with a multi-market product focus
* Be the backbone of our user engagement strategy


 OUR SUCCESSFUL CANDIDATE WILL HAVE:
   

  

 Essential skills:
   

  

* A minimum of 3 years of experience as a UX designer driving projects
* Well versed in the discovery phase of the Triple Diamond design process
* Knowledge of quantitative and qualitative data sources and knows when to use them
* Ability to provide findings with viable solution recommendations in an easily digestible way
* Knowledge of UX best practices with a mobile-first and responsive design approach


 Nice to have skills:
   

  

* Graphic Design Experience
* Proven experience in creating wireframes, storyboards, user flows, process flows, and site maps
* Demonstrable experience with user interface design & ideation mapping tools like Figma, Sketch or AdobeXD
* Experience in working with software engineers
* Experienced with mobile apps


 WHO ARE WE?
   

  

 At the core of LeoVegas Group, is Team Leo. Our culture is our foundation and is what enables us to innovate, build, and lead as we trailblaze our way through the igaming industry. We’re a team of over 1400 innovators, initiators, and groundbreakers working in a fast-paced and agile environment across 11 offices world-wide.
   

  

**Benefits**
* Competitive basic salary
* Life-Occupational injuries & sickness insurance
* Possibility to enroll in an attractive private health care insurance for both you and your partner
* 5,000 SEK wellness contribution p/a
* 30 annual vacation days
* 1,500 SEK tech allowance
* Occupational Pension - Details on request
* Benify - A benefits portal with lots of attractive discounts
* Parental Pay
* Workation 4 weeks per year!
* Plenty of great company events
* Mobile phone & laptop of your choice
* If you are not based in the job location we will also provide you with a relocation package including flights and accommodation support
* Flexible hybrid working model


 JOIN US!
   

  

 In our pride, we like to empower our teammates to find their roar and run with their wildest ideas. We don’t wait around for things to happen, we pounce and make it happen!
   

  

 Do you think you would be a good fit for the Leo pride - give us a roar!
   

  

 \*\*As our company working language is English we’d like to see your CV in English please\*\*

title: Senior Level Designer
description:
**Technical Designer** 




 We are looking for a skilled Technical Designer to join our dynamic game development team of around 100 developers. In this position, you will serve as the bridge between design and code, playing a key role in shaping the technical design of our projects. You’ll be responsible for creating, implementing, and maintaining tools, systems, and workflows to enhance the development process.
 



 You will collaborate closely with the Design Director, fellow Designers, and Production leadership to help define project estimates, scope, and timelines.
 



  





**Responsibilities:** 



* Develop prototypes to assist the design team in experimenting with and refining new features.
* Identify and address technical challenges in design concepts, offering solutions or alternatives.
* Contribute to the enhancement of tools and workflows, particularly those focused on design.
* Design, balance, and optimize technical gameplay systems, such as environmental destruction mechanics.
* Work alongside other disciplines to ensure design intent aligns with non-design pipelines and technologies.



  





**What We’re Looking For:** 



* 3+ years of experience in technical design within the game development industry.
* In-depth understanding of AAA PvP gameplay and systems design, including player psychology, UX design, and gameplay mechanics.
* Proficiency with Unreal Engine, particularly in scripting and blueprints.
* Familiarity with programming languages such as C#, Lua, or Python (knowledge of the Unreal Engine-Angelscript plugin is a plus).
* A creative and inquisitive mindset, capable of thinking critically about design challenges.
* A solid understanding of other game development areas such as animation, game physics, or 3D art.
* Excellent collaboration skills, especially in cross-disciplinary teams.
* Professional-level English communication skills.



 This is an exciting opportunity to be part of an innovative game development team in a collaborative and creative environment. If you’re passionate about technical design and eager to push the boundaries of gaming, we would love to hear from you!

title: Project Manager
description:
**Job Description:**
 We are Merkle Sweden - part of Merkle Northern Europe. Merkle is a leader in data-driven customer experience management (CXM), and we help the world's best brands deliver unique, personalized customer experiences across channels and devices. We provide expertise in digital analytics, customer experience strategy and consulting, user experience design, CRM, data management, commerce, content management systems (CMS), adtech and martech. We are part of Merkle worldwide and dentsu – a global agency network covering 145 markets.
   

  

 We are a global agency, so your role will be to have a broad, diverse set of responsibilities within a dynamic and fast-paced environment.
   

  

 As a project Manager, you will oversee, plan and lead client projects to ensure qualitative deliveries. You will focus on client needs, strengthening these relationships and ensuring that we exceed expectations in every aspect. You will foster smooth collaboration between clients and our team of strategists and specialists across various domains, including customer experience strategy, UX/UI design, A/B testing, data analysis, CRM, technical implementation, web development and change management.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities:**
* Day-to-day client and team communication and management ensuring work progresses according to plan and ensuring client satisfaction.
* Manage project status and finances by updating reports and ensuring projects stay on budget.
* Scoping and planning of new projects
* Team resourcing


**Qualifications**
* You have 3+ years of experience in similar positions from an agency/consulting company.
* You understand the fundamental principles of customer experience.
* You are client-focused and understand client needs.
* Strong understanding of agile methodologies and their application in project management.
* You possess a strong strategic mindset.
* You have strong professional, organizational, and administrative skills, demonstrating proactivity to manage daily challenges.
* You find it exciting to be part of a client team, you manage to bring out the best in others and know when to delegate responsibility and when to take charge yourself.
* You have a good understanding and communication skills in both Swedish and English since both languages will be used in the workplace.


**About Dentsu Sweden:**
 Dentsu Sweden is part of a global communications network with 72,000 employees in more than 145 countries. We offer our employees the opportunity to work with several market-leading brands and exciting clients. All our Swedish companies are environmentally certified according to Svensk Miljöbas, and we actively work with our social and environmental responsibilities as employers and fellow human beings. Diversity, Equity & Inclusion are deeply rooted in our shared values - the 8 Ways to Never Before - and our Leadership Framework is applicable to all our employees. We are proud of what makes us unique as a company and individuals, and we encourage applicants from all different types of backgrounds to apply to us.
   

  

 We offer, among other things:
   

  

* Collective agreement
* 5000 SEK in wellness allowance
* 30 days of vacation
* Flexibility and the best possible mix of two good things, working at our offices and working from home
* Many career and development opportunities


**Application and contact**
 Is your heart racing a little now? If you can see yourself in all this – both the job and being part of Merkle – we would love to hear from you.
   

  

 The position is full-time with permanent employment and is located at our Stockholm or Gothenburg office. There is no application deadline, finding the right candidate is more important to us than a fast process. The job ad will be removed after filling the position.
   

  

 For questions, contact:
   

  

 Maria K. Cederbrand, Senior Talent Acquisition Partner
   

  

 maria.cederbrand@dentsu.com.
   

  

**Location:**
 Stockholm
   

  

**Brand:**
 Merkle
   

  

**Time Type:**
 Full time
   

  

**Contract Type:**
 Permanent

title: Technical Lead
description:
**Technical Lead - Stockholm - Product Development** 




  





 Our client is seeking a Technical Lead with proven experience in building products used by millions of consumers or small businesses. In this role, you will provide technical leadership for an innovative merchandising app designed for fashion and lifestyle merchants, ensuring a seamless, pixel-perfect user experience.
 



  





 Working closely with product and design teams, you’ll play a hands-on role in building and promoting the product while leading a core team of experienced engineers.
 



  





**Responsibilities** 



* Drive the passion and ambition of the engineering team
* Be a proactive leader by promoting ideas.
* Align technical, merchant, product and business needs.
* Set and implement the company's technical vision, direction, and standards.
* Identify opportunities for innovation and improvement across tech/process/people.
* Lead, motivate, and coach performance/feedback to build a lovable product that sells.
* Make daily decisions & tradeoffs between speed/quality to find the best solutions.
* Determine different solutions for different situations: e.g. features, and platforms.



  





**Requirements** 



* Experience with consumer-facing, product-led growth and distribution.
* Experience being product-minded and how to evolve a product in line with the business goals and customer needs.
* Strong understanding of UX.
* Experience with their stack: a React/Typescript Frontend and a modern Python (fast API) backend. Infrastructure runs on Kubernetes in GCP with ArgoCD.
* Experience in B2C / B2B SaaS
* Ideally experience in an Editor-type product: customisable/creative
* Able to create a forward vision about what AI can do from both a development and feature point of view.
* Strong interpersonal and communication skills: the ability to listen, align, and challenge to build a high-trust, high-performance team even without a direct report line.
* Entrepreneurial, and at times hacker-mindset, able to manage through uncertainty and reduce complexity
* Passionate about their impact and able to motivate others.



  





**Benefits** 



* 4.5% Pension
* 4000 SEK in annual wellness allowance
* 10,000 SEK annual learning allowance
* 30 paid vacation days
* Company Laptop
* Quarterly off-site socials



  





 This is an opportunity to shape a highly creative, intelligent solution that merchants love, combining strategic leadership with hands-on technical contributions within a dynamic, collaborative team.

title: Product Leader, Flights
description:
****About Agoda****
 Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with a global network of 4.7M hotels and holiday properties worldwide, plus flights, activities, and more . Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 7,100+ employees representing 95+ nationalities in 27 markets foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.
   

  

**Our Purpose –** 
**Bridging the World Through Travel**
 We believe travel allows people to enjoy, learn and experience more of the amazing world we live in. It brings individuals and cultures closer together, fostering empathy, understanding and happiness.
   

  

 We are a skillful, driven and diverse team from across the globe, united by a passion to make an impact. Harnessing our innovative technologies and strong partnerships, we aim to make travel easy and rewarding for everyone.
   

  

****About Agoda****
 Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with more than 2.5 million accommodations globally. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 6,000+ employees representing 90+ nationalities foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability of our customers to experience the world.
   

  

**Get to know our team:**
 In Product, ideas come alive. The world is moving fast, so our culture empowers ownership and minimal bureaucracy. That’s the environment that enables you to do what you think is right – and quickly. Our Product Managers move fast, fail, learn, and pivot.
   

  

 Being a product-centric organization, our team works cross-functionally to build products from conception to launch by bringing together the engineering and business worlds. Agoda Product Managers work closely with executive leadership and have high visibility among the C-suite; they have a direct impact on Agoda’s growth and strategy. The product puts our travelers first and delivers that special travel experience in the most creative expression.
   

  

**The opportunity:**
 We’re looking for a
 **Product Leader** 
 for the
 **Flight Product team** 
 . This role is
 **Bangkok-based** 
 and is an
 **individual contributor role** 
 .
   

  

 The Flight Product Team at Agoda is seeking a Product Leader with a
 **strong background in complex platform** 
**s and air distribution** 
 , an empathic understanding of customer struggles, and strong stakeholder management skills.
 **Background in the travel industry, especially in the flight space is a strong plus** 
**(Flight distribution, GDS, IATA, booking lifecycle, supply optimization, user experience in booking and post booking area).**
 The Product Leader will be responsible for the global strategy, roadmap implementation and growth of our flight business. You’ll work with internal & external stakeholders and platform customers to resolve the most relevant, dial-moving features. You’ll then partner with the technology team to deliver innovative scalable solutions on time and on target.
   

  

 You will get dedicated engineering resources that you, and only you, define and allocate. We expect you to have a hands-on mentality and spend considerable time with your SCRUM teams, have the enthusiasm to develop engineered processes and technologies, and apply innovative solutions to make organizational improvements. Product Managers can modify every system we have in our company to suit their needs.
   

  

**In this role, you’ll get to:**
* Develop and execute the product roadmap for the Flight Platform, aligning it with the company’s overall strategic goals and vision.
* Partner with customers of the Flight Platform to understand their needs and account for those needs as you build out solutions with your team.
* Conceptualize, launch, and optimize flight products and features, experiment, test their performance, and iterate quickly.
* Conduct market research, competitive analysis, and customer insights to identify market opportunities and user needs .
* Define higher-level objectives and key results and translate those into requirements, and stories, establish landmarks, and lead the execution of projects across multiple teams.
* Spend time in quantitative data monitoring of critical metrics around platform health and feature quality, and understand the relationship between those platform metrics, key business results, and customer happiness.
* Work collaboratively with Engineering, Marketing, Content, Flight commercial & supply operation and UX teams on cutting-edge technologies.
* Develop innovative solutions to some of the world’s difficult problems by collaborating as needed across regions, product areas, and functions.


**What you’ll need to succeed:**
* 7+ years of proven track record as a product manager, preferably in the flight /travel industry with a focus on flight platforms.
* Possesses a deep understanding of the travel industry, particularly in the flight sector
* Proven ability to leverage analytics and quantitative methods to inform and influence decision-making
* Strong data skills
* Excellent communication skills (both verbal and written in English) with a proven ability to convey complex messages clearly and with conviction to different stakeholders
* Entrepreneurial and analytical skills; effective at breaking down complex problems and driving and managing change
* Hands-on mentality, with a proactive approach to problem-solving


**It’s great if you have:**
* MBA or master’s degree in Math, Economics, Computer Science, or Statistics
* Strong proficiency in data tools such as SQL, Python, R, or equivalent


 #seattle #sanfrancisco #beijing #newyork #london #bangkok #singapore #chicago #hongkong #singapore #berlin #shanghai #losangeles #boston #austin #toronto #luxembourg #munich #oslo #copenhagen #stockholm #helsinki #brussels #hamburg #stuttgart #taipei #hamburg #stuttgart #dublin #telaviv #sydney #melbourne #perth #vancouver #montreal #prague #paris #dublin #telaviv #milan #rome #tokyo #osaka #amsterdam #moscow #saintpetersburg #frankfurt #shenzhen #istanbul #dubai #kiev #seoul

title: AI Engineer
description:
**AI Engineer på Kundo – Driv framtiden för AI inom kundservice** 




 Vill du vara med och driva AI- och teknik-transformationen inom kundservice?
 



 Kundo är ett SaaS-bolag som erbjuder Sveriges mest okrångliga kundservicesystem. Vi arbetar hårt mot målet att bli Nordens ledande helhetsleverantör av digitala kundservice-produkter. Kundservicebranschen förändras snabbt, och framväxande AI-teknologier ger stora möjligheter till effektivisering och innovation. Vi står inför en spännande och ambitiös resa där vi bygger en plattform som driver AI-baserad förändring.
 



  





 På vår fortsatta tillväxtresa letar vi nu efter en skicklig och visionär AI Engineer som ansluter till vårt fantastiska utvecklingsteam. I denna roll får du en unik möjlighet att arbeta med den senaste AI-tekniken och driva innovation i en föränderlig bransch där kundservice håller på att transformeras helt och hållet.
 



  





**Rollbeskrivning** 




 Som AI Engineer på Kundo kommer du att ingå i ett tvärfunktionellt team där fokus kommer att vara att utveckla och implementera AI-drivna funktioner för vår produkt.
 



 Du arbetar både med att förbättra och utveckla produktens effektivitet och användarupplevelse genom att införa AI som en naturlig del i hela vår produktlösning, och att utveckla hela bolagets produktstrategi och -erbjudande baserat på AI.
 



 Du kommer att arbeta nära våra UX-designers, produktchefer och andra teammedlemmar, där du leder processen från att identifiera kundbehov till att välja rätt AI-lösning, implementera och optimera dessa, samt mäta effekten av dem.
 



  





**Huvudsakliga ansvarsområden** 



* Designa, utveckla och underhålla AI-baserade system med hjälp av den senaste tekniken, såsom stora språkmodeller (LLM), Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG), AI-agenter och AI-pipelines.
* Samarbeta med tvärfunktionella team för att säkerställa att AI-lösningar är i linje med kundernas behov och verksamhetsmål.
* Bidra till att forma Kundos långsiktiga AI-strategi och utveckling.



  





**Vad vi söker** 




 För att trivas i denna roll har du troligtvis följande kvalifikationer:
 


* Minst 5 års erfarenhet av mjukvaruutveckling
* Goda kunskaper i Python
* Minst 2 års Erfarenhet av att arbeta med modern AI-teknik som stora språkmodeller, AI-pipelines och agenter.
* Ett starkt intresse för AI-innovation och erfarenhet av att designa och implementera AI-lösningar.
* Meriterande är erfarenhet av data engineering.



  





 Har du några frågor? Hör gärna av dig till Jonatan Larsson på 070-5124424 eller jonatan@kundo.se. Vi hanterar själva rekryteringsprocessen internt och tar inte hjälp av externa partners.

title: Junior SAP Commerce Cloud Developer
description:
***Join Our Team as a Junior SAP Commerce Cloud & Azure Developer***




  





 Are you passionate about shaping the future of B2B eCommerce and customer experience? The
 ***Customer Experience and Commerce Solutions***
 team at
 ***Outokumpu IT***
 is on a mission to design and develop cutting-edge solutions that enhance our customers' journey and boost business performance.
 



  





 The
 ***Outokumpu Customer Portal***
 is a B2B eCommerce and eService web site offered to
 ***Outokumpu***
 customers in Europe. It is implemented as a modern, layered architecture, based on SAP eCommerce, a microservice layer on Azure, SAP Integration Suite and a variety of regional and global ERP order and fulfilment systems.
 



  





 If you're a dynamic backend developer looking for a role with impact, innovation, and growth opportunities, we want to hear from you!
 



  





***About the Role***




 As a
 ***Junior SAP Commerce Cloud & Azure Developer***
 , you’ll play a key role in building and maintaining the
 ***Outokumpu Customer Portal***
 — a state-of-the-art B2B eCommerce and eService platform for our European customers. Working alongside a talented team of developers, architects, and UX/UI designers, you’ll have the opportunity to:
 


* Develop and maintain backend solutions for SAP Commerce Cloud and Azure.
* Ensure seamless integration of backend services with the customer portal.
* Collaborate on scalable, secure, and innovative backend solutions.
* Troubleshoot technical challenges and optimize performance.
* Participate in code reviews and ensure adherence to best practices.



  





***What We’re Looking For***




***Qualifications***
*:* 



* A relevant academic degree with 1–3 years of backend development experience.
* Proficiency in SAP Commerce Cloud and Azure platforms.
* Hands-on experience with RESTful APIs, microservice architecture, and database management.
* Strong skills in Java programming.
* A team player with problem-solving abilities and a collaborative mindset.
* Bonus: Experience with SAP Integration Suite.



  





***Key Stakeholders You'll Work With***
*:* 



* Lead Developer
* UX/UI Designers, Developers, and QA Engineers
* Customer Portal Product Owner
* Technical Architect



  





***Why Join Outokumpu?***



* ***Exciting Challenges***
*:* 
 Help create next-level customer experiences and make a tangible impact.
* ***State-of-the-Art Tech***
*:*

 Ready to bring your skills to the next level?

title: Sap Advanced Business Application Programming Developer
description:
***Job Opportunity: ABAP Developer – Customer Portal***




  





***Location:***
 Lithuania, Finland, Poland, Sweden
 



  





 Are you ready to craft next-generation digital solutions that redefine B2B commerce? Join
 ***Outokumpu IT’s Customer Experience and Commerce Solutions team***
 , where innovation meets impact. We design and deliver cutting-edge systems that drive exceptional customer experiences and enhance business performance.
 



  





 We’re seeking a talented and experienced
 ***ABAP Developer***
 to join our mission of transforming the
 ***Outokumpu Customer Portal***
 — a premier eCommerce and eService platform connecting customers across Europe.
 



  





 As an
 ***ABAP Developer***
 , you’ll shape the future of our
 ***B2B eCommerce solution***
 , seamlessly integrating modern architecture with SAP ERP systems. Your contributions will enhance the portal’s capabilities, ensuring efficient operations and an outstanding user experience.
 



  





 The
 ***Outokumpu Customer Portal***
 is a B2B eCommerce and eService web site offered to
 ***Outokumpu***
 customers in Europe. It is implemented as a modern, layered architecture, based on SAP eCommerce, a microservice layer on Azure, SAP Integration Suite and a variety of regional and global ERP order and fulfilment systems.
 



  





***Key Responsibilities:***



* Develop and maintain robust ABAP programs for SAP S/4HANA and legacy ERP systems.
* Build and implement API-based services for the commerce stack.
* Partner with UX/UI designers, developers, and QA teams to achieve seamless system integration.
* Resolve ABAP-related challenges and ensure system stability.
* Engage in code reviews, ensuring adherence to best practices and project standards.



  





***What You’ll Bring to the Team***



* A relevant degree with
 ***3–5 years of ABAP development experience.***
* Proficiency in SAP S/4HANA and earlier ERP systems, with hands-on API development experience.
* Prior experience in ERP-backed eCommerce solutions.
* A problem-solving mindset with excellent communication abilities.
* Bonus: Familiarity with SAP Integration Suite is a plus!



  





***What Success Looks Like***



* Delivering high-quality ABAP solutions that align with Outokumpu’s standards.
* Achieving seamless integration between ABAP services and the Customer Portal.
* Providing swift and effective resolutions to technical issues, earning stakeholder trust.



  





***What We Offer***



* Global impact: Join a mission-driven team contributing to sustainable stainless-steel production.
* Innovative projects: Work on transformative eCommerce and SAP ERP initiatives.
* Career growth: Expand your skills and thrive in a supportive, forward-thinking environment.
* Flexible locations: Work from our offices in Lithuania, Finland, Poland, or Sweden.
* Inclusive culture: Be part of a workplace that celebrates diversity, equity, and inclusion.



  





 This is a Europe-based position with opportunities for occasional travel as part of project collaboration.
 



  





 Ready to make a difference?
 ***Apply now***
 and become a key player in Outokumpu’s digital transformation journey.
 



  





***Your expertise can drive innovation and sustainability in one of the world’s leading stainless-steel companies.***




  





*At Outokumpu* 
***,***
*we promote diversity, equity, and inclusion. We make every effort to ensure all employees feel welcome, heard, and have equal opportunities.*

title: Förvaltare Trafikinformation
description:
**Jobbeskrivning**

Åt stora statliga kunder söker vi flera personer som har nedan profil! Rekryteringsmöjligheterna dyker upp löpande varför vi tar ansökningar löpande. Se bara till att passa in i profilen som nämns nedan så återkommer vi till dig!

**Beskrivning av uppdrag**

Under 2025 har affärsområdet Pendeltåg omfattande och komplexa arbeten som behöver genomföras kopplat till trafikinformationsområdet tillsammans med Trafikverket, IT avdelningen, kommunikationsavdelningen och trafikutövaren. Arbetet kräver en självgående person som gillar att arbeta med förbättringar och har resenären i fokus i alla frågor i en bransch med stora organisationer.

Specifika arbetsuppgifter som konsulten kommer göra är bl.a. följande;

Följa upp trafikentreprenörernas leverans och våra egna leveranser med avseende på trafikinformation och IT system leveranserna.

Följa upp månadsleveransen via rapporter från entreprenörerna samt leda månatliga möten kopplat till trafikinformationsområdet.

Säkerställa interna leveranser till trafikentreprenörer från trafikförvaltningens olika delar (IT, Kommunikation) för att säkerställa att TF uppfyller sin del i leveransen/avtalet.

Samverka med Resenärsservice och IT avdelningen avseende leverans av systemstöd.

Samverka med samtliga projekt-/programkommunikatörer på Kommunikation för att säkerställa en god kommunikation till resenärerna.

Samverka med samtliga Trafikverket och vara speaking partner från Trafikförvaltningen i frågor gällande trafikinformation.

**Obligatoriska kvalifikationer**

* Högskoleutbildning inom IT eller liknande
* Minst 1 års erfarenhet av att jobbat med trafikinformationssystem
* Erfarenhet från minst 2 uppdrag av integrationsarbete mellan olika system

**Vad vi erbjuder!**  
Hos oss kommer du att jobba hos stora statliga kunder som ansvarar för samhällsviktiga funktioner. Du kommer att jobba i en motiverande miljö där alla har respekt som främsta värdeord och där du kommer att utvecklas professionellt. Du kommer att jobba hos kundens HK, hemifrån eller från konsultkontoret som ligger i Centrala Stockholm.

Vi ser framemot din ansökan!  
Team Don Dona Consulting AB

Jobbtyp: Heltid, Tillsvidare

Förväntad arbetstid: 40 per vecka

Förmåner:

* Friskvårdsbidrag
* Företagsevent
* Gymkort
* Jobba hemifrån

Schema:

* Måndag till fredag

Språk:

* Svenska (Obligatoriskt)

Arbetsort: Delvis på distans i Stockholm

title: Open Source Data Engineer
description:
**Open Source Data Engineer**
-----------------------------

Insights & Data är en global affärsenhet inom Capgemini, bestående av 27 000 experter. Vårt fokus? Att med tillförlitliga och skalbara dataplattformar skapa banbrytande maskininlärnings- och AI-lösningar. Från affärsanalys till Gen-AI, vi täcker allt! Vi arbetar inom alla branscher och har en samarbetsmiljö och kultur där ditt unika perspektiv spelar roll.
  

  

**DIN ROLL**  

Är du passionerad över att omvandla rådata till handlingsbara insikter? Som Data engineer kommer du att vara i framkanten av datateknologi. Din roll innebär att arbeta med de senaste verktygen för dataingestion, ETL och orkestrering av datapipelines. Oavsett om det handlar om batchbearbetning eller realtidsströmmande data, kommer du att vara ansvarig för att säkerställa datakvalitet och tillförlitlighet.
  

  

Vad du kommer att göra:
  

**• Designa och Bygga:** Skapa robusta datapipelines.
  

**• Datamodellering:** Utforma effektiva datamodeller som representerar affärsenheter och relationer.
  

**• Samarbeta:** Arbeta nära med ML- och Data Science-team för att förbättra datatransparens och driva strategiskt beslutsfattande.
  

**• Kundinteraktion:** Som en del av ett team kommer du att engagera dig med kunder, förstå deras behov och utveckla optimala tekniska lösningar för att hjälpa dem bli mer datadrivna.
  

**• Brett utbud av projekt:** Capgemini verkar inom olika branscher, så du kommer att få exponering mot olika domäner och teknologier.
  

**• Kunskapsdelning:** Vi främjar aktivt kunskapsdelning och kompetensutveckling. Du kommer att tillhöra specifika expertområden (kompetensområde), där lärdomar och erfarenheter delas.
  

  

**DIN PROFIL**  

* 4+ års yrkeserfarenhet av att arbeta med Data Engineering.
* Omfattande erfarenhet av Open Source och On-prem.
* Förståelse för dataplattformar, datamodellering och datapipelines.
* Stark kompetens i SQL och Python (inklusive Pandas/Polars dataframes).
* Erfarenhet av mjukvaruutveckling (versionskontroll/Git, CI/CD, etc.).
* Kandidatexamen i datavetenskap, teknik eller relaterat område.
* För denna roll bör kandidater kunna flytande svenska.
**VAD VI TROR ATT DU KOMMER ATT UPPSKATTA MED ATT ARBETA HÄR**  

Vi värdesätter vikten av flexibla arbetsarrangemang för att stödja våra medarbetares vardag. Oavsett om det handlar om distansarbete eller flexibla arbetstider, är vårt mål att skapa en miljö där du kan upprätthålla en hälsosam balans mellan arbete och privatliv. I hjärtat av vårt uppdrag ligger din karriärtillväxt. Vårt utbud av utbildningar, karriärsprogram och olika roller är utformade för att hjälpa dig att utforska en värld av möjligheter. Utrusta dig med värdefulla certifieringar i de senaste teknologierna som Databricks och Microsoft Azure.
  

  

**ANSÖKAN**  

Redo att forma framtiden för Data Engineering? Ansök nu!
  

  

**OM CAPGEMINI**  

Capgemini är en global affärs- och teknologitransformationspartner som hjälper organisationer att påskynda deras övergång till en digital och hållbar värld, samtidigt som de skapar en påtaglig inverkan för företag och samhälle. De är ett ansvarsfullt och mångsidigt företag med 340 000 medarbetare i mer än 50 länder. Med 55 års erfarenhet är Capgemini betrodda av sina kunder att frigöra värdet av teknologi för att möta hela bredden av deras affärsbehov. Capgemini levererar helhetslösningar och tjänster som utnyttjar styrkor från strategi och design till ingenjörskonst, allt drivet av våra marknadsledande kapaciteter inom AI, moln och data, kombinerat med deras djupa branschkompetens och partner-ekosystem. Capgemini-gruppen rapporterade globala intäkter på 22,5 miljarder euro för 2023.


Get The Future You Want | www.capgemini.com


#LI-EÖ1
